title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\GetCompanyRequest
name: GetCompanyRequest
description:
Request for getting a company by name.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.GetCompanyRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the company to be retrieved. The format is "projects/{project_id}/tenants/{tenant_id}/companies/{company_id}", for example, "projects/api-test-project/tenants/foo/companies/bar". If tenant id is unspecified, the default tenant is used, for example, "projects/api-test-project/companies/bar".

methods.name: getName
methods.description:
Required. The resource name of the company to be retrieved.

The format is "projects/{project_id}/tenants/{tenant_id}/companies/{company_id}", for example, "projects/api-test-project/tenants/foo/companies/bar". If tenant id is unspecified, the default tenant is used, for example, "projects/api-test-project/companies/bar".
